title: 06/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin continues to be mystified by the Clippers who despite their talented roster lose games they shouldn’t. He shares some bad news for one NBA team that thinks they can contend for a NBA title but clearly they aren’t that close. He also advocates for the expansion of the college football playoff and what we can expect once this inevitably happens. Plus, former NBA head coach George Karl joins the show to tell Colin if the Clippers can comeback against the Jazz after falling down 0-2 once again in the playoffs. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
